An elegiack tribute to the sacred dust of the reverend and worthy Mr. Seaborn Cotton pastour of the Church of Christ at Hampton in New-England: who was discharged from his work and office, to be admitted into heaven, April 20th, 1886. Tompson, Edward, 1665-1705.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by Samuel Green, [Boston : 1686]
Signed: Edward Tompson. Imprint suggested by Wing. Imperfect: folded and mutilated with slight loss of text. Reproduction of original in the Massachusetts Historical Society Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by Samuel Green, [Boston : 1686]
